name: com.tmt.editor-selection.history
description:
View and navigate your editor selection history.
A fork of the 'Editor-History' package from Bedtime Digital Games. 

Default Shortcuts (can be rebound at 'Selection History' in Edit -> Shortcuts) 
- Mouse 3: History Forward 
- Mouse 4: History Backward 

Optional Extension 
If Marijnz's Unity-Toolbar-Extender package (https://github.com/marijnz/unity-toolbar-extender) is present, a 'Selection History' UI button at the upper right corner of the Unity Editor will be present.
